entry.name: innerHeight
entry.title: .innerHeight()
entry.desc: Get the current computed height for the first element in the set of matched elements, including padding but not border.

longdesc.p: This method returns the height of the element, including top and bottom padding, in pixels.
This method is not applicable to window and document objects; for these, use .height() instead.

example.desc: Get the innerHeight of a paragraph.
